summary: A small group of adventurous mountain bikers attempt to race the longest mountain bike route in the world traversing over 2700 miles along the Rocky Mountains from Banff, Canada to the Mexican border.
cast: Mike Dion|Michael 'Mac' McCoy|Steve King|Tina Cutone|Mikaila Cutone-Dion|Dylan Cutone-Dion|Kevin Montgomery|Matthew Lee|Dave Nice|Mary Metcalf-Collier|Hunter Weeks|Anthony Cimino|Leona Ray|Ardie Olson|Sherry Olson|Steven Gleasner|Leighton White|Adrian Stingaciu|Brendan Collier|Felix Wong|Reuben Kline|Kevin Hall|Dominik Scherer|Alan Goldsmith|John Stamstad|Phil Gould|Larry Cortreau|Rob Leipheimer|John Hawkins|Bill Huntsman|Marie Metcalf|Susan Jones|Anton Vanleuken|Jesse Graff|George Freeman|Bill Bemis|Sylvia Gurule|Tucker McHugh|Julie Metcalf|Jim Metcalf|Tim Balderston
title: Ride the Divide
